Articles.Content: The Hype Train is now an IRC #HypeTrain
The website is still down!

> 
> the last button is broken, every time I wanna go to "last", there are more pages behind it...![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

I said that like two seconds ago, make it three pages by the time you see this. 20 to go!
Just commenting for the sake of posterity. I can tell my grandchildren that I was there the day the world changed.

> 
> HarvesterR is ON! Probably Typing up the announcement!

He's viewing the Atmospheric scattering mod.

> 
> I think we're going at plaid 6.358

No lad, we've gone to HypePlaid factor *NINE*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹!

> 
> I went to go eat my lunch and when I got back, there were already 10 more pages!

I know how you feel; went to shower, came back to find 8 new pages.

EDIT: Scratch that, 11 pages.
[http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown) Says 13 minutes, lets get moving!!

> 
> The Hype Train is now an IRC #HypeTrain

How do we get to this IRC?

> 
> the hype train is now an irc #hypetrain

the forum hype train keeps hyping
a challenge would be to guess the page number your comment is going to be at once you post it! my guess for this post: 281
This train feels like it needs some more speed. Allow me to hop on and see if it helps ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Max posts per page, 4 pages till 60.

Harv's online?

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS0m5I7AdMyNsj0B4S5WfvpqwuLr2gHvLsJPtlUxCdqbNKkWxxd](https://t2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS0m5I7AdMyNsj0B4S5WfvpqwuLr2gHvLsJPtlUxCdqbNKkWxxd)
Let's go to page 300 and beyond!
You can DOOOO it!

> 
> My comment for every HypeTrain thread as it nears release:
> It's like a New Year's Eve party with no clocks, everyone is excited and full of anticipation but no one is exactly sure when the big moment will come.

I've heard that before...
Hypeity Hypeity HYPE HYPE HYPE!
almost there...let us just hope that there will be no holds because of range violation
Hype plaid is not a factor. I'm sorry, there's a reason I was the official fireman of the hype train.
We should then upgrade Cthulu to MEGActhulu

> 
> a challenge would be to guess the page number your comment is going to be at once you post it! my guess for this post: 281

WOW you were just like the last post of the page 281
woooo I'm so excited! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Jebediah got the handle and this train it won't stop going, no way to slow down....

dadada dat dat daamm
But it's already tomorrow. Where be 1?
